mapper.select: select id,version,restrictcommodities,mindeposit,validityday, initbalance,ismerlimit,annualaudit,base_card_type,canrevcate,daysperextention,depositable, anonymous,targetarea_id,upperlimit,style_id,description,name,auditdaysinadvance,customer_level, physicalcardtype,internal from tbl_cardtype where id > #{id}
